text:
Bavaqtyani#ShTaM ~MvaqSayA&tha# pAtnIvaqtEnaq pra ca#rati tIqrttha Eqva pra ca#raqtyathO# EqtarhyEqvAsyaq yAma#stvAqShTrO Ba#vatiq tvaShTAq vai rEta#saH siqktasya# rUqpANiq vi ka#rOtiq tamEqva vRuShA#NaqM patnIqShvapi# sRujatiq sO$&smai rUqpANiq vi ka#rOti || 25 
(vaqpayAq - ShaTtri(gm)#Sacca) (A6)
